you're wrong about her?

pa:
a voting thing.
 No. This is

I don't think so.
 I vote it's a voting thing.

pa:
Mr. White,
 weigh in here,
 would you?

The methylamine keeps flowing,

en: Ekkert.
pa: Nothing.

pa:
Hey, yo, Mr. White.
 Hold up.

pa:
I just wanted to say
 I liked your idea.

en: Þú veist, hún er...
pa:
it's pretty, uh...
 You know,

en: Ég held að það sé rétta leiðin.
pa:
the way to go.
 I think it's

en: Ó, hey.

you said it was your...
 your birthday, so...

en: Ég skildi kvittunina eftir í kassanum ef þú vildir skila því.
pa:
I left the receipt
 in the box
 wanna exchange it.
 in case you
vi: Tôi để lại hóa đơn trong hộp phòng khi ông muốn đổi cái khác.

pa:
happy birthday.
 Anyway, hey,

en: Hæ.

I, uh, stopped by
 Hank and Marie's.

Junior is still asking,

They're watching

There's gonna be

en: Gott.

pa:
I wanna

en: Manneskjan sem gaf mér þessa gjöf...
pa:
The person who gave me
 this present

pa: wanted me dead too.

pa: Not that long ago,

he pointed a gun

and he threatened

pa:
He changed his mind

pa: and so will you.
vi: và em cũng sẽ vậy.
